pkgmetadata.longdescription: Extended State-Space SIR Models // An implementation of extended state-space SIR models developed by Song Lab at UM school of Public Health. There are several functions available by 1) including a time-varying transmission modifier, 2) adding a time-dependent quarantine compartment, 3) adding a time- dependent antibody-immunization compartment. Wang L. (2020) doi:10.6339/JDS.202007_18(3).0003.
